description: This file defines the Backbone.js view 'AppView' for a to-do list application, managing UI rendering, event handling, and interactions with the 'todos' collection.

classes.name: app.AppView
classes.description: A Backbone View managing the main UI for the to-do list, including rendering, event handling, and collection interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up event listeners on the 'todos' collection and initializes UI elements.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI based on the current state of the 'todos' collection.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Creates and appends a view for a single todo item.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Adds all todo items to the list.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a single todo.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Generates attributes for a new todo item.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new todo when Enter key is pressed.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Sets all todos as completed or not based on the toggle.
